spothunt

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • spothunt.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes care of the Player.
    It controls a Player (e.g. getDangerLevel, setLocation, toString) and it holds the value for danger, x and y.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jeroen

      The player constructor.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDangerLevel()
      getDangerLevel returns the danger level of the player.
      int getX()
      getX returns the x coordinate of the player.
      int getY()
      getY returns the y coordinate of the player.
      void setLocation(int newX, int newY)
      setLocation moves the Player to a new location, given an x and y.
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString overwrites the default toString() method.

        setLocation moves the Player to a new location, given an x and y.

        newY - the new y coordinate of the player.
